name: v6.5.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "3b00fa0b243b04565abb17d3839a5f4fa6cc2cac571f6db9f83c1982ba1e19e5",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-6.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v6.5.0/rules_scala-v6.5.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Support Scala 3.3.1 by @lukaszrola in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1542
* Added windows task to CI by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1536
* Bump scalafmt version by @mateuszkuta256 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1543
* Fix checksum io_bazel_rules_scala_scala_parallel_collections in Scala3.3 by @lukaszrola in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1544
* Remove binary artifacts due to security policy violation by @mateuszkuta256 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1538
* Use worker proto from @bazel_tools by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1330
* Fix to close the compiler object in scalacinvoker  by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1545
* Add VirtusLab as adopter by @romanowski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1547
* Don't output unused dependency messages when compilation fails by @laurynaslubys in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1548
* Conditionally set -Djava.security.manager=allow for jdk >= 17 by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1555
* Handle the removal of to_proto and to_json from struct by @c-mita in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1554
* fix typo in example tests (Exmaple => Example) by @KevinBoyette in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1553
* Introduce `SCALA_VERSIONS` by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1557
* Introduce build setting for current Scala version by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1558
* Don't rely on `SCALA_VERSION` in phases by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1559
* Make scala_proto_aspect have "provides = [ScalaProtoAspectInfo]" by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1549
* Make scrooge_*_aspect have "provides = [ScroogeAspectInfo]" by @timothyg-stripe in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1565
* Build with JDK 21 by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1556
* Bind toolchains to Scala version by @aszady in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1566

## New Contributors
* @lukaszrola made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1542
* @mateuszkuta256 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1543
* @romanowski made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1547
* @c-mita made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1554
* @KevinBoyette made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1553
* @aszady made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1557
* @timothyg-stripe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1549

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v6.4.0...v6.5.0

name: v6.4.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "9a23058a36183a556a9ba7229b4f204d3e68c8c6eb7b28260521016b38ef4e00",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-6.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v6.4.0/rules_scala-v6.4.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* doc: Register proto toolchain for simple usage by @honnix in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1531
* Use tagged Rules Scala release in README.md by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1533
* Add jdk toolchain type to proto rules by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1534
* Change SemanticdbInfo.plugin_jar from string to File by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1530
* Fix diagnostic outputs for Scala 2.12.13 by @aishfenton in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1532
* Make tests pass on Windows by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1529

## New Contributors
* @honnix made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1531
* @aishfenton made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1532

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v6.3.0...v6.4.0

name: v6.2.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "ae4e74b6c696f40544cafb06b26bf4e601f83a0f29fb6500f0275c988f8cfe40",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-6.2.0",

)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* singlejar executable from specified java compile toolchain by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1511
* Upgrade scala 2.12.x and 2.13.x versions by @scoquelin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1515
* Add support for netrc in jvm_maven_import_external by @dmivankov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1509
* Add SemanticDB support - cont. by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1508
* Fix semanticdb-scalac checksums for Scala 2.12.18 and 2.13.11 by @scoquelin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1518
* Upgrade Scala 2.13.12 and fix compilation issues in reporters by @scoquelin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1517
* JacocoRunner script: update for Bazel 6.0+ by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1516

## New Contributors
* @scoquelin made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1515

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v6.1.0...v6.2.0

name: v5.1.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "6982e330f48517461f231ea596bd93416200286ab73fc070a11052496689f0ee",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-5.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/v5.1.0/rules_scala-v5.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Bump jmh version: 1.20 -> 1.36 by @dkomanov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1466
* Fix external name in workspace snippet by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1469
* Tracking implicit compiler dependencies by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1459
* Add exec transition to scala_test _lcov_merger by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1474
* Update release workflow with a stable archive by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1473
* Add support for Scala 3.2 by @meisam in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1465
* Fix dead link in readme by @hanneskaeufler in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1476
* Update rule dependencies by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1478
* Fixing JacocoRunner building script for Jacoco by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1485
* Catch macro expansion exceptions in ScalacWorker by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1489
* Improve scala_config() documentation in README.md by @kolotyluk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1494
* Handle StackOverflowError in macros by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1491
* Allow user to provide scalac source jar for "ast-plus" dependency tracking feature by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1493
* Mark unused deps as ignored for mixed source targets by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1499
* Replace relative paths to ../ with external/ by @prebeta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1500
* Add support for Scala 3.3 LTS by @csubj in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1501
* For Windows: Fix to enable scala_test and scala_binary outputs to be executed on Windows by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1502
* Make DepsTrackingReporter handle Windows path separators by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1503
* call close() on compiler in scalacWorker after each job by @crt-31 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1504
* Register java toolchain inside rules_scala by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1505

## New Contributors
* @thirtyseven made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1474
* @meisam made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1465
* @hanneskaeufler made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1476
* @kolotyluk made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1494
* @csubj made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1501
* @crt-31 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1502
* @kotlaja made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1505

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/v5.0.0...v5.1.0

name: v5.0.0
body:
## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    sha256 = "141a3919b37c80a846796f792dcf6ea7cd6e7b7ca4297603ca961cd22750c951",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-5.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/archive/refs/tags/v5.0.0.tar.gz",
)
```

See https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala#getting-started for full setup instructions.


## What's Changed
* Add initial repositories for Scala 3.1 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1342
* Update buildkite jobs by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1345
* Fix org_typelevel__cats_core checksum for 2.13 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1346
* Tweaks to `scalafmt` rules/script to support `bazel test` wrappers by @virusdave in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1344
* update default `scalafmt` phase order; place before `runfiles` by @virusdave in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1347
* Fix Bazel latest and 5.0.0 Buildkite jobs by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1348
* Update latest Bazel build to latest green head build by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1349
* Update scrooge support code to compile with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1350
* Update scripts workers to be compatible with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1352
* Update scalac opts in test reporter to support Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1353
* Update jmh support to be compatible with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1351
* Update scalafmt worker to be compatible with Scala 3 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1354
* Scala 3 minimal support by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1355
* Move ScalaTest deps to its own repository macro by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1356
* Clean up versions tests by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1357
* set -e for ctx.actions.run_shell commands by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1360
* Fix deprecation warning in ScalaPBWorker by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1367
* Scalatest version bump to 3.2.9 by @justinass-wix in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1368
* Use java_common.stamp_jar to stamp scala_import jar by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1372
* Justinass/dep analyzer by @justinass-wix in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1370
* Allow per-target java runtime selection for scala_junit_tests by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1373
* Single-jar pack_sources should conform to Bazel behavior by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1378
* Take --instrumentation_filter into account in coverage phase by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1377
* Add runtime_jdk to scala_binary by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1380
* Create jdeps output from classpath entries by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1376
* Allow `scala_junit_tests` targets to specify test environment variables by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1384
* Consistent argsfile parsing by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1385
* Revert "Create jdeps output from classpath entries (#1376)" by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1388
* Use a public java_compile_toolchain attr instead of _java_toolchain by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1389
* scala_doc: Use param file to build scaladocs by @rahuliyer95 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1390
* Expose `_source_jars` output group in `scala_import` by @Duhemm in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1394
* JacocoRunner script: update for Bazel 5.0+ by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1399
* feat: added support for inherited_environment in scala_test rule by @omerlh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1401
* Fix JacocoInstrumenter compilation with JDK 13+ by @dmivankov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1402
* scala_doc: Export ScaladocAspectInfo to allow users to build custom scaladoc aspects by @rahuliyer95 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1404
* Fix rules_scala JDK lookup when using --nolegacy_external_runfiles. by @srdo-humio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1397
* Declare non-windows executable with .sh extension by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1407
* Put -s in front of other parameters for the ScalaTest runner. by @srdo-humio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1412
* Fix aspect test to recognize `@//` labels by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1417
* Fix test_scala_proto_library to accept @-prefixed labels by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1418
* Make 5.3.1 minimal supproted version by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1423
* Cleanup Bazel 5.2 test by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1426
* Allow scala_benchmark_jmh to specify a runtime_jdk version by @wiwa in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1424
* Update Coverage test data to Bazel 5.3.1 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1427
* Test examples with Bazel 5.3.1 by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1428
* docs: fix broken links by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1429
* fix: enable to override JAVABIN of wrapper script by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1432
* Extract scalacopts phase by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1435
* Suppress warning and enable to use dependency_tracking with `-Werror` by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1433
* Validate repository Scala version against scala_config by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1436
* Fix setup guide in readme by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1444
* Revert "Declare non-windows executable with .sh extension" by @ittaiz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1446
* Update example Rules Scala setup macros by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1438
* Update Rules Scala commit in README instructions by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1447
* java_stub_template to use argument file instead of classpath jar by @ittaiz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1410
* Fix resource priority under name collision by @tanishiking in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1456
* add tagged release workflow using github actions by @jvandew in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1452
* Simplify setup of scala_toolchain and its deps by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1439
* Add setup testing toolchain macro by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1451
* phase_merge_jars: refactor to separate function that merges jars to o by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1403
* Fix toolchain type reference by @tgeng in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1460
* Update to be removed "host" cfg to "exec" by @liucijus in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1462
* Replace zipper with singlejar by @simuons in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1463

## New Contributors
* @virusdave made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1344
* @justinass-wix made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1368
* @wiwa made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1373
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1377
* @Duhemm made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1394
* @omerlh made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1401
* @dmivankov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1402
* @srdo-humio made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1397
* @Wyverald made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1417
* @tanishiking made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1429
* @jvandew made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1452
* @tgeng made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/pull/1460

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/compare/20220201...v5.0.0

name: Tag master as of 2022-02-01
body:
```
http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_scala",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/20220201/rules_scala-20220201.zip",
    type = "zip",
    strip_prefix = "rules_scala-20220201",
    sha256 = "77a3b9308a8780fff3f10cdbbe36d55164b85a48123033f5e970fdae262e8eb2",
)
```

name: Last version containing tut_rule
body:
### Motivation
`tut` is no longer supported (even binaries are not available), therefore `tut` related code was removed from `rules_scala`.

This release contains a separate workspace (downloadable as `http_archive`) with removed `tut_rule`, so you could use that rule with later `rule_scala` versions (but it won't be supported).

### Migration

#### workspace
```
http_archive(
    name = "tut_rule",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_scala/releases/download/tut/tut_rule.zip",
    strip_prefix = "tut_rule",
)

load("@tut_rule//:tut.bzl", "tut_dependencies")

tut_dependencies()
```

#### build
Replace `load("//tut_rule:tut.bzl", "scala_tut_doc")` with `load("@tut_rule//:tut.bzl", "scala_tut_doc")`

name: Test detection and XML output edition
body:
This release requires bazel 0.2.1.

The main new features are:
- add an XML test formatter that writes junit XML results where bazel wants them #24 
- pass the JAVACMD to scalac so the java environment from bazel is used #19 
- fix a bug with resources not adding all items #17 
- deprecate using explicit suites in tests, autodetection of scalatests should work #7
- support empty srcs to allow scala_library with only exports and runtime_deps #5 

thanks to @johnynek @smparkes @dinowernli and @avibryant for contributions to this release.
